item.title: FrontView 房地产投资信托基金寻求在美国首次公开募股中最多筹资 2.77 亿美元
item.description: FrontView 房地产投资信托基金（FrontView REIT）周二表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标是筹集高达 2.772 亿美元的资金。【原文：FrontView REIT is aiming to raise as much as $277.2 million in its initial public offering in the United States, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，德国主要研究机构将 2024 年 GDP 预测值下调至-0.1%。
item.description: 熟悉秋季联合经济预测数据的人士周二告诉路透社，德国主要经济机构下调了对2024年的预测，目前认为欧洲最大的经济体将萎缩0.1%。【原文：Germany's leading economic institutes have downgraded their forecast for 2024 and now see Europe's largest economy shrinking by 0.1%, people familiar with the figures from the autumn joint economic forecast told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 期货因软着陆乐观情绪和中国刺激政策而上涨
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走高，原因是投资者对经济实现 "软着陆 "持乐观态度，同时也对中国出台的丰厚刺激计划感到高兴。【原文：U.S. stock index futures trended higher on Tuesday, as investors were optimistic about the economy achieving a goldilocks "soft landing" scenario, while also cheering a bumper stimulus package out of China.】

item.title: 美国 中国经济放缓，欧洲打喷嚏，新高在望
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国核电站不会立即为大科技公司的人工智能野心提供动力
item.description: 星座能源公司（Constellation Energy）和微软公司（Microsoft）计划重启三里岛核电站，希望能迅速获得足够的气候友好型能源，为快速扩张的人工智能（AI）数据中心提供电力。【原文：Constellation Energy and Microsoft plan to restart the Three Mile Island nuclear plant, hoping they have scored a quick source of enough climate-friendly energy to power rapidly expanding data centers for artificial intelligence (AI).】

item.title: 诺和诺德首席执行官因减肥药定价问题面临美国国会审查
item.description: 美国参议员伯尼-桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）将于本周二就诺和诺德首席执行官拉尔斯-约根森（Lars Jorgensen）提出质询，质询内容涉及该制药商的热门减肥药和糖尿病药物的价格，美国人每月可能要花费超过1000美元。【原文：U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders is set to question Novo Nordisk CEO Lars Jorgensen on Tuesday over the drugmaker's prices for its popular weight-loss and diabetes medicines that can cost Americans more than $1,000 a month.】

item.title: 礼来公司的阿尔茨海默氏症药物在日本获批
item.description: 礼来公司周二表示，日本卫生部已批准其治疗阿尔茨海默病的药物多那尼单抗，这是继去年9月卫材和百健的Leqembi获得批准后，为患者提供的又一种治疗选择。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Tuesday Japan's health ministry has approved donanemab, its drug for Alzheimer's disease, providing patients with another treatment option after Eisai and Biogen's Leqembi received the nod in September last year.】

item.title: 美联储降息为面临中国竞争的美国工厂带来的缓解有限
item.description: 美国生产商正面临着降息也无法缓解的不利因素。【原文：U.S. producers are facing headwinds that lower interest rates won’t alleviate.】

item.title: 美国债券 ETF 发行量同比增长 50
item.description: 根据 CFRA 和 Strategas 的数据，受美联储降息预期的推动，2024 年债券型交易所交易基金的发行量比去年同期增长了近一倍。【原文：Launches of bond-focused exchange traded funds have nearly doubled over year-ago levels in 2024, boosted by expectations of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, according to data from CFRA and Strategas.】

item.title: 摩根大通支持 Centivo 7500 万美元的股权和债务融资
item.description: 医疗保健公司 Centivo 周二表示，该公司已获得 7500 万美元的股权和债务融资，并得到了 Cone Health Ventures 和美国最大银行摩根大通摩根健康部门的支持。【原文：Healthcare firm Centivo on Tuesday said it has secured $75 million in equity and debt financing, backed by Cone Health Ventures and the largest U.S. bank JPMorgan Chase's division Morgan Health.】

item.title: 班克曼-弗里德的前女友埃里森将因加密货币欺诈被判刑
item.description: 前加密货币高管卡罗琳-埃里森（Caroline Ellison）将于本周二被判刑，因为她在被监禁的前男友山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）从他创办的现已破产的 FTX 交易所盗窃约 80 亿美元客户资金的过程中扮演了重要角色。【原文：Former cryptocurrency executive Caroline Ellison is set to be sentenced on Tuesday for her role in her imprisoned former boyfriend Sam Bankman-Fried's theft of about $8 billion in customer funds from the now-bankrupt FTX exchange he founded.】

item.title: 美国敲定授予 Polar Semiconductor 1.23 亿美元芯片合同
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，已敲定向 Polar Semiconductor 提供 1.23 亿美元的拨款，用于扩建其位于明尼苏达州的工厂，这将使该公司在美国的功率和传感器芯片生产能力提高近一倍。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said on Tuesday it had finalized a $123 million grant for Polar Semiconductor to expand its plant in Minnesota, which would allow the company to nearly double its U.S. production capacity of power and sensor chips.】

item.title: 人工智能需求强劲，台湾 8 月出口订单超出预期
item.description: 由于对用于人工智能（AI）应用的芯片的需求持续攀升，台湾 8 月份的出口订单超出预期。【原文：Taiwan's export orders exceeded expectations in August as demand for chips used for artificial intelligence (AI) applications continued to climb, with the government seeing the strong momentum extending to the rest of the year.】

item.title: 意大利设计师 Alberta Ferretti 卸任品牌创意总监一职
item.description: 意大利时装集团 Aeffe 周二表示，意大利设计师阿尔伯塔-费瑞提（Alberta Ferretti）将卸任其同名品牌创意总监一职，在此之前，她已为该品牌工作了 43 年。【原文：Italian designer Alberta Ferretti is stepping down as creative director of her eponymous brand after 43 years, fashion group Aeffe said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国就美国PVH公司涉嫌抵制新疆产品一事展开调查
item.description: 中国商务部周二表示，中国将对 Calvin Klein 和 Tommy Hilfiger 的母公司 PVH 进行调查，原因是该公司在新疆相关产品方面涉嫌违反市场交易原则。【原文：China will launch an investigation into PVH, the parent company of Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger, for suspected violations of market trading principles regarding Xinjiang-related products, the commerce ministry said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 丰田扩大股票回购计划以反映股价跌幅
item.description: 鉴于最新股价，丰田汽车公司周二将截至 4 月 30 日的股票回购计划从 1 万亿日元（83.1 亿美元）增加到 1.2 万亿日元（83.1 亿美元）。【原文：Toyota Motor on Tuesday increased its share buyback plan through April 30 to up to 1.2 trillion yen ($8.31 billion) from 1 trillion yen in view of the latest share price.】

item.title: 中国的 Leapmotor 和 Stellantis 在欧洲签订了经济型电动汽车订单
item.description: 中国的 Leapmotor 汽车公司及其合作伙伴 Stellantis 周二表示，将开始在欧洲接受一款城市轿车和一款 SUV 的订单，以扩大其在该地区的经济型电动汽车（EV）产品。【原文：China's Leapmotor is set to start taking orders in Europe for a city car and an SUV, the automaker and its partner Stellantis said on Tuesday as they expand their budget electric vehicle (EV) offering in the region.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会批准瑞士电信与意大利沃达丰的交易
item.description: 瑞士电信公司周二表示，欧盟委员会已根据外国补贴法规批准瑞士电信收购沃达丰意大利公司。【原文：The European Commission has approved an acquisition of Vodafone Italia by Swisscom under the foreign subsidies regulation, the Swiss telecoms company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新日铁称将出售 Posco 股份以提高资产效率
item.description: 日本新日铁公司周二表示，将出售韩国浦项制铁控股公司（Posco Holdings）总计 290 万股股份，以 "提高资产效率"。【原文：Japan's Nippon Steel said on Tuesday it would sell a total of 2.9 million shares in South Korea's Posco Holdings in an effort to "improve asset efficiency".】

item.title: 摩根大通亚洲区高官表示看好印度和日本
item.description: 摩根大通是美国最大的银行，该行的一位高级官员表示，摩根大通看好亚洲的印度和日本，但也热衷于向东南亚分配资源，因为东南亚正受益于 "中国加一 "战略。【原文：JPMorgan , the largest bank in the U.S., is bullish on India and Japan within Asia but is also keen to allocate resources towards Southeast Asia, which is benefiting from the "China Plus One" strategy, a top official at the bank said.】

item.title: 日本央行行长上田表示，如果趋势性通胀加速，日本央行将提高利率
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）周二表示，如果通胀趋势如预期加速，央行将加息，但不会预先设定加息时间表。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Tuesday the central bank will raise interest rates if trend inflation accelerates as projected, but will not do so with any pre-set schedule in mind.】

item.title: 一些日本首相候选人希望更容易雇用和解雇工人
item.description: 至少有两位竞选日本下一任首相的候选人正计划解决日本最神圣的政治问题之一：劳动力市场改革，这将使企业更容易雇用和解雇工人。【原文：At least two candidates vying to become Japan's next prime minister are planning to tackle one of the country's most sacred political cows: labour market reforms that would make it easier for businesses to hire and fire workers.】

item.title: 中国推出大范围降息和其他刺激措施以刺激疲软经济
item.description: 中国于周二宣布了一系列措施，以支持摇摇欲坠的经济、稳定住房部门并恢复市场信心。消息公布后，股票和债券大幅上涨。【原文：China announced a broad range of measures on Tuesday to support the faltering economy, stabilise the housing sector and restore market confidence. Stocks and bonds jumped after the announcement.】

item.title: 印尼央行第四季度两次降息，美联储宽松政策支撑外汇市场信心
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）对经济学家进行的一项调查预测，印度尼西亚银行（BI）在9月18日意外降息后，今年将再降息两次，原因是印尼盾走强和通胀低迷使央行可以集中精力支持经济增长。【原文：Bank Indonesia (BI) will cut interest rates twice more this year following a surprise reduction on Sept. 18, a Reuters poll of economists predicted, as a stronger rupiah and subdued inflation allows the central bank to focus on supporting growth.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行维持利率不变，继续保持鹰派立场
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二一如预期维持利率稳定，并重申需要继续收紧政策，在美联储大张旗鼓地启动宽松政策一周后坚持自己的立场。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday held interest rates steady as expected and reiterated that policy needed to stay tight, sticking to its guns a week after the Federal Reserve started its easing campaign with a bang.】

item.title: 早间竞标没有火箭筒，但中国的最新刺激政策令人欣慰
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，李维斯警告称将推迟实现 100 亿美元的销售目标
item.description: 据《金融时报》周二报道，李维-斯特劳斯（Levi Strauss）到 2027 年实现 90 亿至 100 亿美元收入的现有目标将被推迟。【原文：Levi Strauss' existing target to hit $9 billion to $10 billion in revenue by 2027 would be pushed back, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国推出广泛刺激措施振兴经济
item.description: 中央银行将把银行必须持有的现金储备量削减 50 个基点。【原文：The central bank will cut the amount of cash that banks must hold as reserves by 50 basis points.】

item.title: 即时观点：投资者对中国大范围降息的反应
item.description: 中国央行行长潘功胜周二表示，中国央行将下调银行存款准备金率50个基点，并进一步降低主要利率，以支持物价回升。【原文：China's central bank will cut banks' reserve requirement ratio by 50 basis points and further reduce key interest rates to support a recovery in prices, its governor Pan Gongsheng said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Miniso 因计划收购永辉超市股份而股价下跌
item.description: 周二，美尼苏集团控股公司股价暴跌 39%，此前这家生活用品零售商表示，将以 63 亿元人民币（约合 8.9305 亿美元）的价格收购中国超市运营商永辉超市 29.4% 的股份。【原文：Shares of Miniso Group Holding plunged 39% on Tuesday after the lifestyle products retailer said it would take up a 29.4% stake in Chinese supermarket operator Yonghui Superstores for 6.3 billion yuan ($893.05 million).】
